name: STUDYID
label: Study ID. Default to 'XX9999-9999'.

name: DOMAIN
label: SDTM domain. Default to 'LB'.

name: SITE
label: Site identifier

name: SUBJID
label: Subject identifier

name: FSUBJID
required: Mandatory when scrambled subject IDs are used for blinding
label: Scrambled subject ID. [If scrambling is not needed:] Default to NULL.

name: VISIT
label: Visit name

name: LBREFID
label: Unique sample identifier: Sample ID, requisition number or barcode, e.g. 'AB124578'.

name: TOPICCD
label: Topic code

name: SUPTEST
label: Supplier assessment name.

name: LBORRES
required: Mandatory when a result is obtained
label: Result. LBORRES should be NULL if a result is not obtained. If the result is categorical, the LBORRES value should be compliant with CDISC CT codelist LBSTRESC (e.g. 'NEGATIVE')  or sponsor-defined extensions.

name: UNITCOLL
required: Mandatory when a result is obtained for numeric assessments except for unitless data
label: Collected unit. UNITCOLL should be compliant with CDISC CT codelist UNIT (e.g. 'mmol/L') or sponsor-defined extensions. Supplier should not perform unit-based conversion of results. UNITCOLL should be NULL for unitless data, e.g. pH.

name: LBORNRLO
required: Mandatory if there is a reference range with a lower limit
label: Lower limit of supplier reference range applicable to the subject in same unit as the result. LBORNRLO should be NULL if there is not a lower limit.

name: LBORNRHI
required: Mandatory if there is a reference range with an upper limit
label: Upper limit of supplier reference range applicable to the subject in same unit as the result. LBORNRHI should be NULL if there is not an upper limit.

name: LBNRIND
required: Mandatory if LBORNRLO and/or LBORNRHI are populated
label: Reference range indicator. Indicates where the result falls with respect to reference range defined by LBORNRLO and LBORNRHI: - 'LOW' - 'NORMAL' - 'HIGH'

name: LBSTAT
required: Mandatory when a result is not obtained
label: Completion status. Populate with 'NOT DONE' if LBORRES is NULL, otherwise NULL.

name: LBREASND
required: Mandatory when a result is not obtained
label: Reason why result could not be obtained.

name: LBNAM
label: Short name of the laboratory that performed the assessment. Default to 'LAB X'. [Short name as specified in 'List of MFT suppliers'. Note that if the supplier is delivering results from assessments performed by other labs, the red text above should be changed to list the names of these  labs.]

name: LBLOINC
label: LOINC code.

name: LOINCVER
label: LOINC code version.

name: LBSPEC
label: except in rare cases where specimen is irrelevant
column9: Specimen type. LBSPEC should be compliant with CDISC CT codelist SPECTYPE (e.g. 'PLASMA', 'SERUM', 'URINE') or sponsor-defined extensions.

name: LBSPCCND
label: Specimen condition. Used in cases where a result is obtained, but the sample is less than optimal. LBSPCCND should be compliant with CDISC CT codelist SPECCOND (e.g. 'HEMOLYZED') or sponsor-defined extensions.

name: LBMETHOD
label: Method of assessment or examination. LBMETHOD should be compliant with CDISC CT codelist METHOD (e.g. 'ELISA') or sponsor-defined extensions.

name: LBANMETH
label: Analysis method. Describes the method of secondary processing applied to a complex observation result, e.g. 'CREATININE 2021 CKD-EPI FORMULA'.

name: LBFAST
required: Mandatory when fasting status affects an assessment and/or is specified in the protocol
label: Fasting status. - If subject was fasting: 'Y' - If subject was not fasting: 'N' - If not relevant: NULL

name: LBDTC
required: Mandatory when date is present at source
label: Datetime of specimen collection in ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS, e.g. 2020-10-12T14:30:15.

name: LBTPT
required: Mandatory when assessment is performed at a planned time point
label: Planned time point name

name: SUBEVNUM
label: Subevent number, which is used to distinguish unplanned resampling. Resampling is done when the original sample cannot be used. - If no resampling: SUBEVNUM should be 0. - If resampling is done for the same VISIT, SUBJID and TOPICCD but different --DTC and --REFID: SUBEVNUM should be 0 for the first sample and it should be incremented by 1 for each new sample. Note: SUBEVNUM should not be used for retest of the same sample as only the final test result should be delivered.

name: COMMENTALL
label: Comments that do not fit into other columns.
